EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.L.G.G.12127.CDP pay as you go.Report Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Your complementary Analysys Mason report has arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your interest in Nokia Pay as you go IoT device management. Here is your complementary report, Agility and flexibility will drive CSPs' adoption of SaaS-based customer care systems.
If you have not already done so, please check out our solution <[[https://networks.nokia.com/pay-as-you-go-cdp]]>, start the free developer trial <[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B06WW31W8J?qid=1501082751104&sr=0-1&ref_=srh_res_product_title]]>, and learn how to onboard IoT devices <[[https://prd-publish.networks.nokia.com/pay-as-you-go-cdp/device-onboarding]]>. You can also sign up <[[https://prd-publish.networks.nokia.com/pay-as-you-go-cdp/get-started]]> for a demo or hands on trial with us.
Best regards, Nokia IoT Device Management Team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
